description: A massive ancient ship created during the Void Century by the denizens of Fish-Man Island. It is approximately half the size of Fish-Man Island itself and is connected to an ancient promise made with Joy Boy. The ship is meant to be pulled by Sea Kings under Poseidon's command.

keyEvents.title: Noah Begins Its Descent Toward Fish-Man Island
keyEvents.description: The massive ship unexpectedly begins moving and descending toward Fish-Man Island, threatening to destroy it.
keyEvents.significance: Creates the immediate crisis of the arc and highlights Noah's importance as an ancient artifact.

keyEvents.title: Shirahoshi Uses Herself as Lure
keyEvents.description: Shirahoshi swims toward Noah to divert its course away from Fish-Man Island.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Noah as both a threat and the catalyst for Shirahoshi's character growth.

statusHistory.reason: Ship was stationary in the Sea Forest
Vander Decken IX threw the ship using his Devil Fruit power

description: An underwater island located 10,000 meters below sea level, beneath the Red Line. It is the birthplace of fish-men and merfolk, and serves as a gateway to the New World. The island exists within a massive bubble.

keyEvents.title: Threatened by Noah's Approach
keyEvents.description: The island faces potential destruction as the massive Noah ship descends toward it.
keyEvents.significance: Creates the central crisis that drives the episode's conflict.
